titleStmt.title: An inquiry into the remarkable instances of history and Parliament records used by the author of The unreasonableness of a new separation on account of the oaths, whether they are faithfully cited and applied.
titleStmt.author: Brady, Robert, 1627?-1700.

notesStmt.note: "A criticism of Edward Stillingfleet's 'A discourse concerning the unreasonablness of a new separation'"--BM.
Written by R. Brady. Cf. Wing.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
